languages.text: "Уж простите, шерин, но не верится мне, что из миллиардов подданных Чорды не осталось хотя бы и горстки отчаянных, уповающих на провидение Великого и цепляющихся за жизнь. Кому, как не вам, стать их спасением?"

traits.locale_text: "Уж простите, шерин, но не верится мне, что из миллиардов подданых Чорды не осталось хотя бы и горстки отчаянных, уповающих на провидение Великого и цепляющихся за жизнь. Кому, как не вам, стать их спасением?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"
languages.original_text: "Уж простите, шерин, но не верится мне, что из миллиардов подданных Чорды не осталось хотя бы и горстки отчаянных, уповающих на провидение Великого и цепляющихся за жизнь. Кому, как не вам, стать их спасением?"

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among billions of Chorda's subjects there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence and still clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among billions of Chorda's subjects there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence and still clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je m'excuse, shereen, mais je refuse de croire qu'il n'y a pas eu, parmi les milliards de sujets de Chorda, une poignée d'irréductibles assez fervents pour en appeler encore à la providence de l'Exalté et s'accrocher désespérément à la vie. Qui sera leur planche de salut, sinon vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"

traits.locale_text: « Je m'excuse, shereen, mais je refuse de croire qu'il n'y a pas eu, parmi les milliards de sujets de Chorda, une poignée d'irréductibles assez fervents pour en appeler encore à la providence de l'Exalté et s'accrocher désespérément à la vie. Qui sera leur planche de salut, sinon vous ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “请原谅我，亲爱的，但我坚信，库尔达麾下那几十亿的臣民之中，至少还有一小部分绝望的灵魂依然相信至高无上的神皇，仍然在努力支撑下去。如果你不去拯救他们，还有谁能成为他们的救世主？”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我，亲爱的，但我坚信，库尔达麾下那几十亿的臣民之中，至少还有一小部分绝望的灵魂依然相信至高无上的神皇，仍然在努力支撑下去。如果你不去拯救他们，还有谁能成为他们的救世主？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Shereen, doch ich weigere mich zu glauben, dass es unter den Milliarden von Chordas Untertanen nicht zumindest eine Handvoll verzweifelter Seelen gab, die noch an Vorsehung des Erhabenen geglaubt und sich ans Leben geklammert haben. Wer soll ihre Erlösung sein, wenn nicht wir?"
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Shereen, doch ich weigere mich zu glauben, dass es unter den Milliarden von Chordas Untertanen nicht zumindest eine Handvoll verzweifelter Seelen gab, die noch an Vorsehung des Erhabenen geglaubt und sich ans Leben geklammert haben. Wer soll ihre Erlösung sein, wenn nicht wir?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Perdóneme, sheeren, pero me niego a creer que, entre los miles de millones de súbditos de Chorda, no hubiera al menos un grupo de almas desesperadas que aún confiara en la providencia del Exaltado y luchara por sobrevivir. ¿Quién los salvará si no es usted?».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"

traits.locale_text: «Perdóneme, sheeren, pero me niego a creer que, entre los miles de millones de súbditos de Chorda, no hubiera al menos un grupo de almas desesperadas que aún confiara en la providencia del Exaltado y luchara por sobrevivir. ¿Quién los salvará si no es usted?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「悪いね、シャリーン。だけど、あたしは数十億のチョーダの臣民の中に、未だにエグザルテッド・ワンの施しを信じて、必死に生きようと死に物狂いな魂が一握りもいるとは思えないよ。アンタ以外に誰が彼らを救えるんだい？」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"

traits.locale_text: 「悪いね、シャリーン。だけど、あたしは数十億のチョーダの臣民の中に、未だにエグザルテッド・ワンの施しを信じて、必死に生きようと死に物狂いな魂が一握りもいるとは思えないよ。アンタ以外に誰が彼らを救えるんだい？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Beni affet şirinim ama Chorda'nın tebaası arasında Görkemli'nin yazgısına güvenen ve hayata tutunan bir avuç da olsa birileri olmadığına inanmayı reddediyorum. Onların kurtuluşu sen olmayacaksın da kim olacak?"
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, shereen, but I refuse to believe that among the billions of Chorda's subjects, there wasn't at least a handful of desperate souls still trusting in the Exalted One's providence, clinging to life. Who will become their salvation if not you?"
